com.wx.lexer

Class Lexer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.wx.lexer.Lexer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IoIterator<Token>

    public class Lexer
extends java.lang.Object
implements IoIterator<Token>
    Parses any text input stream into token of the following types.

      • next

        public Token next()
           throws java.io.IOException
        Parses the next token and returns its type.

        When the last token has been reached, this method returns the type EOF.

        Specified by:
        next in interface IoIterator<Token>
        Returns:
        Type of the currently parsed token
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
